sentences: The Secretariat introduced the report on the workshop on reporting methodologies in the context of Article 3.14 (adverse effects and response measures) ( FCCC/SBI/2006/27 ).

The EU, supported by JAPAN, expressed concern regarding the proliferation of agenda items, observing overlaps with the SBSTA agenda item on Protocol Article 2.3 (adverse effects of policies and measures), and suggested a single agenda item.
SAUDI ARABIA urged substantive rather than procedural discussions.
Chair Asadi proposed establishing a contact group.
The EU opposed this, citing concern relating to duplication of agenda items under SBSTA and SBI.
enb_long_title: Twenty-sixth sessions of the Subsidiary Bodies (SB 26) of the United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change (UNFCCC)
